#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b) {
	if(b == 0)
		return a;
	return gcd(b, a % b);
}

int main(int argc, char const *argv[]) {
	int T;
	cin >> T;
	for(int i = 0; i < T; i++) {
		int A, B;
		cin >> A >> B;
		if(A < B) {
			A = A ^ B;
			B = A ^ B;
			A = A ^ B;
		}
		cout << gcd(A, B) << " " << (long long)((A * B) / gcd(A, B)) << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
